original: Natthi puthujjanassa paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇāti?
analyzed: natthi puthujjanassa paññā pajānanā vicayaḥ pavicayaḥ dhamma vicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇā ati

original: nanu atthi puthujjanassa paññā pajānanā vicayo …pe…
analyzed: nanu atthi puthujjanassa paññā pajānanā vicayo pe

original: Hañci atthi puthujjanassa paññā pajānanā vicayo …pe…
analyzed: hañci atthi puthujjanassa paññā pajānanā vicayaḥ pe

original: paccupalakkhaṇā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: paccupalakkhaṇā no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Hañci puthujjano paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjeyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci puthujjanaḥ paṭhamam jhānam samāpajjeyya no ca vata re vattabbe
gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhāram dadeyya ati

original: Hañci puthujjano gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ dadeyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci puthujjanaḥ gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhāram dadeyya no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Puthujjano tena ñāṇena dukkhaṁ parijānāti, samudayaṁ pajahati, nirodhaṁ sacchikaroti, maggaṁ bhāvetīti?
analyzed: puthujjanaḥ tena ñāṇena dukkham parijānāti samudayam pajahati nirodham sacchikaroti maggam bhāveti iti
